arts.ttl: Danny da Costa rescues a precious point for Mainz against in-form Hoffenheim
arts.sum: Danny da Costa scored a rare goal to earn Mainz a well-deserved point at home to a Hoffenheim side that were on a four-game winning streak on Matchday 11. Hollerbach's initial attempt was blocked, but the ball fell kindly for substitute da Costa, who fired home from close range to level the scores at 1-1.

arts.ttl: Baumann and Kohr set contrasting records as Mainz end Hoffenheim's winning streak
arts.sum: Mainz and Hoffenheim shared the spoils after a dramatic second-half display.

arts.ttl: Confirmed Lineups: Mainz 05 vs. TSG Hoffenheim
arts.sum: Here are the two lineups for the opening matchday 11 Bundesliga encounter.

arts.ttl: Mainz 05 vs. Hoffenheim preview: 05ers aiming to kick-start their escape from the drop zone
arts.sum: Preview, team news and predicted lineups as an out-of-sorts Mainz welcome an in-form Hoffenheim to the Mewa Arena on Friday evening (20:30 CET).
